rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {BTH2746, GEN2041}

description: This unit examines the methods and protocols of bioinformatics, genomes, DNA and protein sequence analyses. Topics covered include methods of information retrieval from various internet databases; bioinformatics softwares, data entry of bioinformatics information, computer modelling of macromolecules, and  functional genomics.
